string.text: The SR-25 is an AR-15 rifle scaled up to shoot 7.62x51mm NATO. This rifle also found a favor in US Military. All rifles built on the SR-25 platform share the same basic action. Because of the AR-15 style recoil buffer tube it cannot be fitted with a folding stock. Instead it is fitted with telescoping stock.\n \n

A powerful weapon that was heavily modified to support 23x75 ammo. The TOZ 66 is a close range firearm possessing both reliability and effectiveness. This peculiar TOZ-66 was modified according to the Zone's needs by supporting larger, more efficient rounds that the classic 12ga. This earned quite a reputation among stalkers as an efficient gun to hunt large mutants like Chimeras.\n \n
